Trigger.Name: 1月环+钢铁
Trigger.RegularExpression: shine the path to conquest!|照亮铁血霸道！

Trigger.Name: 1月环+热离子
Trigger.RegularExpression: scorch mine enemies!|用你的炽热烧尽敌人！

Trigger.Name: 2热离子+月环
Trigger.RegularExpression: shine down your light!|给予我月亮的祝福

Trigger.Name: 2热离子+钢铁
Trigger.RegularExpression: lead me to conquest!|乃成铁血霸道

Trigger.Name: 3跳跃+月环
Trigger.RegularExpression: in blessed light to bask!|我降临于此， 对月长啸

Trigger.Name: 3跳跃+钢铁
Trigger.RegularExpression: mine enemies to smite!|征战铁血霸道

Trigger.Name: 4俯冲+陨石流
Trigger.RegularExpression: outshine the stars for the moon!|在星降之夜，称赞红月

Trigger.Name: 4俯冲+热离子
Trigger.RegularExpression: the earth with a fiery kiss!|照亮红月下炽热之地

Trigger.Name: 5跳跃+月环+陨石流
Trigger.RegularExpression: From on high I descend, a hail of stars to bring|我降临于此对月长啸

Trigger.Name: 5月环+跳跃+陨石流
Trigger.RegularExpression: From red moon I descend, a hail of stars to bring|我自月而来降临于此， 召唤星降之夜！

Trigger.Name: 6钢铁+热离子+跳跃
Trigger.RegularExpression: Gleaming steel, take fire and descend|成为我降临于此的刀剑吧

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: 远离远离，分摊分摊，散开散开

Trigger.Name: 6钢铁+跳跃+热离子
Trigger.RegularExpression: Gleaming steel, plunge and take fiery edge|钢铁成为我降临于此的燃烧之剑

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: 远离远离，散开散开，分摊分摊

Trigger.Name: 6月环+钢铁+跳跃
Trigger.RegularExpression: From red moon I draw steel, in my descent to bare|我自月而来携钢铁降临于此

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: 月环月环，远离远离，散开散开

Trigger.Name: 6月环+跳跃+热离子
Trigger.RegularExpression: From red moon I descend, upon burning earth to tread|踏过炽热之地

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: 月环月环，散开散开，分摊分摊

Trigger.Name: DoomTrigger6
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:(?<name>.*?) gains the effect of Doom from for 6.00 Seconds

Trigger.Name: DoomTrigger16
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:(?<name>.*?) gains the effect of Doom from for 16.00 Seconds

Trigger.Name: DoomTrigger10
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:(?<name>.*?) gains the effect of Doom from for 10.00 Seconds

Folder.Name: 痛苦之手警报器（每次判定前血量危险发出警告）

Trigger.Name: P1开场自动标点（不用可以不点）
Trigger.RegularExpression: “亚历山大绝境战”任务开始。|战斗开始

Trigger.Name: 顺劈提醒 (自行选择开启、关闭)

Folder.Name: 苏帕酱噗 （需要自己选择声音文件路径哦）
2运（云玩家打法）（需要自动防击退在P2麻将处开启即可）

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: 点名雷，去残暴方向的最边上
去残暴和亚历山大之间
二运开始，去残暴正义脚下
集合分摊，然后三三分组
兄弟们相信我，这把整活了！这要不过我把水基佬吃下去
